Class CSVApplicationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.repository.csv.CSVApplicationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationRepository
public class CSVApplicationRepository extends Object implements IApplicationRepository
CSV-based implementation of the application repository. Follows the Single Responsibility Principle by focusing only on application data access.
